info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 3:21PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Teller and central El Paso Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 321 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over southwestern Colorado Springs, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Colorado Springs, Fountain, Monument, Air Force Academy, Manitou Springs, Palmer Lake, Black Forest, Peyton, Schriever AFB, Security, Falcon, Security-Widefield, Stratmoor, Gleneagle, Fort Carson, Peterson AFB, Cimarron Hills and Cascade. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
